Posts.Content: debmary1 wrote: I am Stage 1 and have acute closed angle glaucoma and am not a candidate for Tamoxifen. The doctor said there is no other drugs to help with pre menopause. My cancer is estrogen positive. I've had radiation only and now I feel helpless since I cant take Tamoxifen.. Any one else unable to take hormonal therapy and if so what did you do?
